item.title: Emerging Equities Gain First Time in Five Days on Alibaba Surge
item.description: Emerging-market equities headed for the first gain in five days, led by advances in artificial intelligence-related stocks in Hong Kong and China.

item.title: Asian Shares Dip After Tech Selloff, Alibaba Jumps: Markets Wrap
item.description: Asian equities came under pressure after a tech selloff hit Wall Street Friday, with chip shares among the losers. Hong Kong was an outlier as Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. surged.

item.title: Alibaba’s AI Revenue Climbs Even as China Food War Hurts Profit
item.description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported a surge in revenue from China’s AI boom, helping offset a surprise drop in profit tied to a worsening battle with Meituan and JD.com Inc. in internet commerce.

item.description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported a surge in revenue from China’s AI boom, helping offset a surprise drop in profit tied to a worsening battle with Meituan and JD.com Inc. in internet commerce.

item.title: Alibaba, JD.com Deals Give Shot in the Arm to Asia Loan Market
item.description: Technology giants Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and JD.com are adding a jolt of energy to the Asian-Pacific syndicated loan market with plans to raise billions of dollars in foreign currency.

item.title: Alibaba, JD.com Deals Give Shot in the Arm to Asia Loan Market
item.description: Technology giants Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and JD.com are adding a jolt of energy to the Asian-Pacific syndicated loan market with plans to raise billions of dollars in foreign currency.

item.title: Alibaba Risks Deepening $100 Billion Rout as Turf War Heats Up
item.description: A protracted battle in China’s food-delivery market has chopped $100 billion in market value from Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., with no end in sight for damage to profits and investor confidence.

item.title: Alibaba Risks Deepening $100 Billion Rout as Turf War Heats Up
item.description: A protracted battle in China’s food-delivery market has chopped $100 billion in market value from Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., with no end in sight for damage to profits and investor confidence.
